title: FULL Web3 Roadmap in 2023 (And how to create your own token)
description: Blockchain Development is a hot topic, and people keep searching for things like Blockchain Development for beginners, Blockchain Development roadmap, web3 roadmap 2023, web3 dev roadmap, web3 developer roadmap etc. Hence, in this video, Harkirat Singh talks about the step by step and the fastest way to learn Blockchain Development/web3 development and get a job in 2023.

title: Complete Full Stack Developer Roadmap! (2023 Edition)
description: In this video, Harkirat Singh shares with you a step by step complete roadmap for full stack development in 2023. If you're looking to become a full stack developer, and are looking for a roadmap for the same, this video is a perfect fit for you as he talks about each and every step that you need to follow in your journey of being a full stack developer.
courseContent: 44:24 - you need to know javascript before proceeding
48:00 – Returning HTML and JSON in a http server
50:21 – Creating Routes for the LEETCODE site

title: Full Stack Roadmap - Cloning leetcode ?
description: This is the third part of the full stack roadmap. In this video, we understand how we can connect frontends and backends!
courseContent: 30:37 – HTTPS request from Browser to Backend

title: Getting high paying tech job through open source contribution
description: In this video, I contribute to an open source project live which helped get a high paying remote job and is the best way in 2023 to get a tech job. If you are interested in open source, then this video is for you!

title: Most Demanding Programming Skill Which Everyone Should LEARN | Web3 or AI or Full Stack?
description: IIn this video, Harkirat Singh talks about the buzz which is revolving around Web3, AI and Full Stack development in the tech field. He talks about the right way to approach this buzz and which one should you prefer.
